about_the_game:
Check out our first demo of The Heroes of the Citadel!

Unite a shattered world! Dive into the epic 'Heroes of the Citadel'. The fate of the world lies in your hands!
Your feedback is very important to us, so let us hear it!

A World Under Siege


In the once peaceful realm of Entaron, mysterious forces converge, disrupting tranquillity and sowing chaos. The insidious presence of Filth corrupts minds, transforming allies into enemies, while the newly awakened Lord of Darkness seeks to reclaim his domain. Amidst this turmoil, a band of heroes rises, determined to quell the encroaching darkness.

Dive into Heroes of the Citadel and traverse Entaron's captivating landscapes alongside Vastron, the steadfast knight, and Merilda, the skilled archer with a hidden past. As challenges mount, you'll enlist the help of unique allies, from the wise magician Angaret to the fierce goblin warrior Togoshi. With the weight of a world resting on your shoulders, strategy, choices, and teamwork become paramount. The fate of Entagon lies in your hands. Will you be its saviour or its downfall?

heroes and Foes Await

In Heroes of the Citadel, players are thrust into a world where a myriad of unique characters await. Embark on your journey as one of the distinct heroes, each with a unique skill set. Heroes like Vastron, Merilda, and Angaret each bring distinct skills and backgrounds that shape the unfolding adventure. However, your path is not unchallenged; formidable foes also lurk in the shadows. From grotesque creatures like the Defiled and Hungry Barrels to powerful guardians such as the Golem and the Satyr, challenges abound in every corner, testing your mettle and strategy at every turn.

strategy and Combat


In Heroes of the Citadel, it's not just about the might but the mind. Harness the unique talents of your assembled team in exhilarating battles. As players, you'll be tasked with:

  • Arena Battles: Engage in cutthroat PvP duels in the arena. Outsmart your opponents, climb the leaderboards, and stand victorious.
  • Hero Progression & Upgrades: Cultivate a roster of dynamic heroes, honing their abilities and tailoring your team's strengths to suit various challenges.
  • Campaign Mode: Begin a campaign, where outcomes hinge on your chosen team dynamics. Each choice you make determines the fate of Entagon.

prepare For Battle

To arms, young warrior! The citadel's horn calls, beckoning brave souls to its mighty walls. As the night grows darker, your valour, wisdom, and alliances will be tested like never before. Each clash, every strategy, and the clans you join will determine the very fabric of this world. Ready yourself, rally your kin, and step forth into a saga that promises legend and honour. Entagon awaits its heroes. Will you answer the call?
